description:
Legendary mounts will be added.
Enjoy fighting battles in an all-new way.

■Content
Legendary Mounts:
Elephant, Panda, Bear, Hex Mark, Storm, Mammoth, Ghost, Black Shadow, Silver Coat, and Iron Coat

■How to use
You can change mounts from camp by selecting "Party" - "Form Team".
name: Legendary Mounts Pack
